query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rescheduleRequests` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `appointment_id` int NOT NULL,
  `patient_id` int NOT NULL,
  `detected_message` text,
  `detected_keywords` json,
  `status` enum('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `notes` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `resolved_at` timestamp NULL,
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_appointment` (`appointment_id`)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3dy73aS7obdDVgV.73116cb9d21b --database Xh2xRagQAoY5NjF5TC3DfV --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `rescheduleRequests` (

  `appointment_id` int NOT NULL,
  `patient_id` int NOT NULL,
  `detected_message` text,
  `detected_keywords` json,
  `status` enum('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `notes` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `resolved_at` timestamp NULL,
  INDEX `idx_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_appointment` (`appointment_id`)
);
